name: Infinity Dash (StreetHD)
description:
Join an amazing and wonderful world where you have to run , jump and dodge all the obstacles in order to survive and to be the NR #1 on the leaderboard.
This game is a race which will test and will improve all your skills , attention , patience  and your reflexes.  You can also take advantages with the power ups you can buy from the game shop , which will make your experience even greater than before.
To join the leaderboard/ ranking you have to make a minimum of 200  points , and to pass all the another contenders you will have to to your best . Good luck and have a lot of fun!
